channel.title: Blog on Palmyra International Shotgun Range
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Palmyra International Shotgun Range

item.title: Thursday Nights
item.description: Every Thursday night you can come to the Shotgun Range and Pratice your Bunker Trap skills or shoot Bunker for the first time. Always a good time at the range… Img 001 Img 002 Img 003 Img 004 Img 005 Img 006

item.title: Automated Clay Thrower
item.description: Raspberry PI Powered Clay Thrower Link to my Raspberry PI powered Clay Thrower. The first project I ever did with a PI. My first project using Python and PHP.
